title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body:
I really need help bc this:
Go into your League of Legends folder in C:/Riot Games
Open up the "RADS" folder.
Open up the "Projects" folder.
Open up the "lol_air_client" folder.
Open up the "releases" folder.
Open up the folder that's in there. It changes every patch, but contains the same stuff.
Delete the two files named "S_OK" and "release manifest"
Open up the "deploy" folder.
Delete the "lol.properties."
Run the league client as admin.
This will usually fix it. If not you may have to uninstall league and reinstall it.

Isn't working bc I don't have some of those files. I would really appreciate help!

replies.body: Can you dive into more specifics on the initial issues you're experiencing? Does the patcher crash right after launch or is there another specific behavior you're seeing from the patcher? With this information, I'll be able to provide some steps to take to resolve this. Thanks!
